alert.note: Alert for Madison; St. Clair (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 26 at 10:42AM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Urban area and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Illinois, including the following counties, Madison and Saint Clair. * WHEN...Until 300 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1036 AM CDT, local law enforcement reported numerous lingering road closures due to flooding. Flooding is already occurring. Between 3 and 8 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... St. Louis, Belleville, Granite City, O`Fallon, East St. Louis, Collinsville, Fairview Heights, Cahokia, Swansea, Shiloh, Columbia, Mascoutah, Pontoon Beach, Centreville, Lebanon, Freeburg, Caseyville, Washington Park, Dupo and Millstadt. - This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 9 and 27.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
